Package nusri.fyp.demo.service

Class VideoService

java.lang.Object
nusri.fyp.demo.service.VideoService
@Service public class VideoService extends Object
Service class for handling video uploads, processing video frames, and interacting with the state machine.
This service processes uploaded video files, sending frames to a model for recognition and interacting with the state machine for processing.

  • Constructor Details

    • VideoService

      public VideoService(ConfigService configService, ImageSenderServiceImplOfEoid imageSenderServiceImplOfEoid, ImageSenderServiceImplOfRoboflow imageSenderServiceImplOfRoboflow, StateMachineService stateMachineService)
      Constructs the VideoService with the required services for video processing.
      Parameters:
      configService - The configuration service.
      imageSenderServiceImplOfEoid - The EOID implementation of the image sender service.
      imageSenderServiceImplOfRoboflow - The Roboflow implementation of the image sender service.
      stateMachineService - The state machine service.

  • Method Details

    • processVideo

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<? extends Serializable> processVideo(String user, String presetName)
      Processes an uploaded video by sending frames to the model for recognition and storing the results in the state machine.
      The processing is done asynchronously. If no file is found for the user, an error is returned. Once processing is complete, the recognition results are returned.
      Parameters:
      user - The user identifier, used to distinguish different users' sessions or uploads.
      presetName - The preset name, related to the state machine preset.
      Returns:
      A response entity containing the result of the video processing, or an error message if an issue occurs.

    • uploadAndSave

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> uploadAndSave(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile videoFile, String user) throws IOException
      Uploads and saves a video file to the server and resets the state machine.
      This method ensures that the uploaded file is stored in a fixed path, and the associated state machine is reset.
      Parameters:
      videoFile - The uploaded video file.
      user - The user identifier.
      Returns:
      A response entity indicating the result of the save operation.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while saving or writing the file.

    • isValidFilename

      public static boolean isValidFilename(String name)
      Validates the given filename to ensure it does not contain invalid characters or reserved names.
      This validation is especially relevant for systems like Windows that have restrictions on file names.
      Parameters:
      name - The filename to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the filename is valid; false if it contains invalid characters or reserved names.

    • processImage

      public boolean processImage(String img, String user, String timestamp)
      Processes a single frame (image) from the video stream, passing it to the corresponding model for recognition and updating the state machine with the results.
      This method is used to process individual images, sending them to the model and updating the state machine.
      Parameters:
      img - The Base64 encoded image data.
      user - The user identifier.
      timestamp - The timestamp or frame identifier.
      Returns:
      true if the image was processed successfully; false if no image was uploaded.

    • getProgress

      public Double getProgress(String user)
      Retrieves the current video processing progress (from 0 to 1).
      This method returns the progress of the video processing, calculated as the ratio of processed frames to total frames.
      Parameters:
      user - The user identifier.
      Returns:
      A double value representing the progress of the video processing (0 = not started, 1 = completed).

    • getFileResponse

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getFileResponse(String user) throws MalformedURLException
      Returns the previously uploaded video file for download or streaming.
      If the video file does not exist, a 404 status is returned.
      Parameters:
      user - The user identifier.
      Returns:
      A response entity containing the video resource, or a 404 error if the file is not found.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - If the URL format is invalid.
